mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.articleno AS "articleno", a.name AS "name", a.brandname AS "brandname", a.marketprice AS "marketprice", a.discount AS "discount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM a_dlyb_product a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.articleno LIKE '%'||#{articleno}||'%' '%'+#{articleno}+'%' concat('%',#{articleno},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_dlyb_product( id, articleno, name, brandname, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{articleno}, #{name}, #{brandname}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE a_dlyb_product SET articleno = #{articleno}, name = #{name}, brandname = #{brandname}, marketprice = #{marketprice}, discount = #{discount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
